commands.description: Copies or swaps VFO A and VFO B frequencies or all parameters

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: 0=A freq to B, 1=B freq to A, 2=swap freq, 3=A all to B, 4=B all to A, 5=swap all

notes: Cases 0-2 affect frequency only; cases 3-5 copy/swap all parameters
RX antenna selections only copy/swap if VFOs are on different bands

commands.description: Sets or reads RX antenna access mask for main receiver

parameters.name: a-g
parameters.description: Enable flags for ANT1 through OPP TX ANT

commands.description: Sets or reads RX antenna access mask for sub receiver

parameters.name: a-g
parameters.description: Enable flags for ANT1 through OPP TX ANT

commands.description: Sets or reads TX antenna access mask
Sets or reads antenna name label
Sets audio feedback tone mode
Sets or reads AF (audio) gain level
notes: Toggle format alternates between last gain value and 0 (mute)
When SUB AF knob is assigned to balance, AG$ returns same as AG

commands.description: Sets or reads auto-info mode for automatic status updates
notes: AI4/AI5 modes risk serial port buffer overflow
Use AID command to set delay (60-999ms)

commands.description: Sets auto-info delay interval for AI modes 1 and 2
notes: Only applies to AI1 and AI2 modes

commands.description: Sets or reads AF limiter level for ear protection when AGC is off
notes: Critical for protecting ears when AGC is disabled

commands.description: Sets or reads TX antenna selection
Sets or reads Audio Peak Filter (APF) mode and bandwidth
Sets or reads RX antenna selection

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: 0=disconnected, 1=ext XVTR/RX ANT IN2, 2=TX antenna, 3=int XVTR, 4=RX ANT IN1, 5-7=ATU RX ANT 1-3

commands.description: Sets or reads ATU mode
Reads bar graph meter value
Sets or reads band independence mode for VFO B
Sets or reads main/sub audio balance
Sets or reads current band number
notes: BN$^; or BN$>; recalls next band stack register
VFO B band changes require VFO B Different Band set to YES

commands.description: Sets or reads serial port baud rate
notes: Alternate format: BRbbbbbb; without port number

commands.description: Sets or reads BSET (B SET button) state
Sets or reads receive filter bandwidth

parameters.name: nnnn
parameters.description: Filter bandwidth in units of 10 Hz

commands.description: Sets or reads remote client connection count
Sets or reads speech compression level for SSB
Sets or reads CW sidetone pitch

parameters.name: nn
parameters.description: Pitch in units of 10 Hz (250-950 Hz)

commands.description: Controls digital voice recorder for playback and recording

parameters.name: subcommand
parameters.description: 0=stop, RC=clear, RM=record mic, RS=record speaker, PMnnnnn=play, MEm=erase, MSm=save, MPm=play msg

notes: GET returns: DA0 (idle), DAPWnnnnn (waiting), DARMnnnnnttttt (recording mic), DAPMnnnnntttttmsc (playing)

commands.description: Controls HDR module mode

notes: K40 is GET only, returns ID017

Returns radio IP address

commands.description: Sends remote paddle or key data stream

parameters.name: ssss
parameters.description: Elements: . (dit), - (dah), Pnnnn (pause), Unnnn (key up), Dnnnn (key down)
